Name: Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore,Blackrock Bounty and Howling in the Hills are pretty hard quests solo. I usually skip them and grind 6.650XP instead. You can try them solo or find a group, if not grind the mentioned XP.
Text: Wanted: Lieutenant Fangore,Blackrock Bounty and Howling in the Hills are pretty hard quests solo. I usually skip them and grind 6.650XP instead. You can try them solo or find a group, if not grind the mentioned XP.

Name: There is a Drop-Quest-Item Glowing Shadowhide Pendant. You have to turn it in in Elwynn Forest, wich I think is a waste of time for 1.400xp. I will NOT include it in this guide, do it if you want though.
Text: There is a Drop-Quest-Item Glowing Shadowhide Pendant. You have to turn it in in Elwynn Forest, wich I think is a waste of time for 1.400xp. I will NOT include it in this guide, do it if you want though.

Name: The next area is pretty dangerous even for good players. Additionally you might wanna do the escort quest that is in the cave(follow the left side). I usually dont do it,so this guide skips it.

Name: Yowler is pretty hard too, as he has 2-3 adds. Do it if you can, grind 2000xp if you dont
